name: No Ponder
description:
A story is being written, and this cube was transformed into an orb, to be pondered by the wise. Only by collecting ink stains can it hope to heal back into a cube and never be pondered again.

How to play

A snake-like game with physics-based controls... and a health bar. The cube orb follows your click/touch.

  • Collect ink stains to heal and get points.
  • Release your click/touch to save energy.
  • Bouncing off the edges can be useful.
  • Clear ink has a (very) small chance to appear, collect it for full health!
Credits

BGM: Dialogue - Umplix, on OpenGameArt

Hope you enjoy!
